sentences.sContent: A poet could not but be gay in such a jocund company.
sentences.sContent_eng: A poet could not but be gay in such a jocund company.
sentences.sCn: 一个诗人在这种兴高采烈的同伴中自然而然地会快乐。

sentences.sContent: Her jocund character made her the most popular girl in the county.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her jocund character made her the most popular girl in the county.
sentences.sCn: 她快乐的个性使她成为这个郡最受欢迎的女孩。
